property.name: rpc.client.timeout
property.description: timeout interval of a RPC invocation in millisecond. default is 3600000.

property.name: rpc.client.connect.tcpnodelay
property.description: whether set socket TCP_NODELAY to true when connect to RPC server. default is true.

property.name: rpc.client.max.idle
property.description: the max idle time of a RPC connection in millisecond. default is 10000.

property.name: rpc.client.ping.interval
property.description: the interval which the RPC client send a heart beat to server. 0 means disable, default is 10000.

property.name: rpc.client.connect.timeout
property.description: the timeout interval in millisecond when the RPC client is trying to setup the connection. default is 600000.

property.name: rpc.client.connect.retry
property.description: the max retry times if the RPC client fail to setup the connection to server. default is 10.

property.name: rpc.client.read.timeout
property.description: the timeout interval in millisecond when the RPC client is trying to read from server. default is 3600000.

property.name: rpc.client.write.timeout
property.description: the timeout interval in millisecond when the RPC client is trying to write to server. default is 3600000.

property.name: rpc.client.socekt.linger.timeout
property.description: set value to socket SO_LINGER when connect to RPC server. -1 means default OS value. default is -1.

property.name: yarn.client.failover.max.attempts
property.description: if multiply resource managers are configured, it is the max retry times when the yarn client try to issue a RPC call. default is 15.
